sentences.en: ‘You mean it took three hours? ’‘And the rest.’.
sentences.cn: “你的意思是花了三个小时？”“还不止呢。”。

sentences.en: "You're worn out, Laura," he said. "Go home and get some rest."
sentences.cn: “你太累了，劳拉，”他说，“回家休息一下吧。”

sentences.en: All the rest I said, all that was bullshit.
sentences.cn: 我说的其余那些全部都是废话。

sentences.en: He wolfed down the rest of the biscuit and cheese.
sentences.cn: 他把剩下的饼干和奶酪一扫而光。

sentences.en: His legs were pitifully thin compared to the rest of his bulk.
sentences.cn: 他的双腿和他庞大身躯的其他部分相比瘦得可怜。

sentences.en: I don't know about the rest of you, but I'm hungry.
sentences.cn: 我不知道你们怎么样，但我是饿了。

sentences.en: I think you ought to give football a rest for a time.
sentences.cn: 我认为你应该暂时停止踢足球。

sentences.en: If you’re tired, we’ll stop and rest for a while.
sentences.cn: 如果你累了，我们就停下来歇一会儿。

sentences.en: it's all very well to talk about natural affection and love and the rest of it.
sentences.cn: 谈什么合乎自然规律的疼啊、爱啊什么的当然并无不可。

sentences.en: Joan Smith's detective stories are a cut above the rest.
sentences.cn: 琼·史密斯的侦探小说比其他侦探小说都要出色。

sentences.en: Rest assured, he probably has rather more common sense than you realize.
sentences.cn: 放心吧，他知道的常识很可能比你以为的要多得多。

sentences.en: She volunteered as a nurse in a soldiers' rest-home.
sentences.cn: 她自告奋勇到士兵疗养院当护士。

sentences.en: Take a well-earned rest and go out and enjoy yourself.
sentences.cn: 你理应休息一下，出去好好玩玩。

sentences.en: The company rented the building, occupied part and sublet the rest.
sentences.cn: 该公司租下了这栋大楼，占用了一部分并转租了其余的部分。

sentences.en: The judge's ruling put to rest the dispute between the neighbors.
sentences.cn: 法官的裁决解决了邻里纠纷

sentences.en: the lift came to rest at the first floor.
sentences.cn: 电梯在一楼停了下来。

sentences.en: The news from Body Shop rattled the rest of the retail sector.
sentences.cn: 从“美体小铺”传来的消息令整个零售行业不安。

sentences.en: The ship has come to rest on the fine sand.
sentences.cn: 这艘船停靠在细沙滩上。

sentences.en: We're going to be left behind by the rest of the world.
sentences.cn: 我们将被全世界甩在后面。

sentences.en: When you are sitting, keep your elbow on the arm rest.
sentences.cn: 坐立时，把胳膊肘靠在扶手上。

sentences.en: You carry these two bags, and I’ll bring the rest.
sentences.cn: 你拿这两个包，剩下的我来拿。

sentences.en: You look exhausted! Why don’t you take a rest?
sentences.cn: 你看上去累坏了！ 为什么不休息一下呢？

words.tran_cn: 宁静的；安静的；给人休息的
倔强的；难驾御的；不安宁的
焦躁不安的；不安宁的；得不到满足的
休息，静止；休息时间；剩余部分；支架
使休息，使轻松；把…寄托于

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)［用以指出一陈述表示得不充分］还不止
不受影响的：不受焦虑或痛苦影响的
n. 卧床休养期；床支架
至于其他事情；除此之外
(非正式)（用于要求停止做或停止说使人生气或生厌的事）算了，别再干了；好了，别说了

phrases.phrase: lay to rest 或 put to rest
phrases.tran_cn: 解决：解决（例如争端），特别是为了不再受其干扰

phrases.phrase: put (或 set) someone's mind (或 doubts 或 fears) at r
phrases.tran_cn: 解除某人的焦虑（或疑虑）；使某人安心

phrases.phrase: rest (或 God rest) his (或 her) soul
phrases.tran_cn: 愿上帝保佑他（或她）的灵魂得到安息
休息日；禁猎日；[宗]安息日
停留在；依靠；被搁在；信赖
完成向法庭提出证据和辩论
休息室；（公共建筑物内的）厕所

trans.tran_cn: 休息，剩余部分，停留，其他，支架，休止符
trans.tran_en: a period of time when you are not doing anything tiring and you can relax or sleep
a period of time when you are not doing anything tiring and you can relax or sleep
to stop working or doing an activity for a time and sit down or lie down to relax
to stop working or doing an activity for a time and sit down or lie down to relax
